snippet: The move shows instability in the ownership structure that has given the French and German governments equal influence over EADS, parent company of Airbus.
abstract: French conglomerate Lagardere says it will likely sell its 7.5 percent stake in European Aeronautic Defense and Space by the end of 2012; move shows instability in the ownerhip structure that has given French and German governments equal influence of the parent company of Airbus.
lead_paragraph: The move shows instability in the ownership structure that has given the French and German governments equal influence over EADS, parent company of Airbus.

headline.main: Lagardère Plans to Sell Stake in EADS
headline.print_headline:
French Conglomerate Is Set
To Sell Stake in Airbus Parent

keywords.value: European Aeronautic Defense and Space Co
keywords.name: organizations
